notes.title: Funding
notes.p: This work was supported by the U.S. DOD Joint Program Executive Office for Chemical, Biological, Radiological, and Nuclear Defense (JPEO-CBRND) Joint Project Manager Medical Countermeasure Systems (JPM-MCS)â€”Joint Vaccine Acquisition Program (JVAP). Opinions, interpretations, conclusions, and recommendations are those of the authors and are not necessarily endorsed by the U.S. Army. This article was co-written by an officer or employees of the U.S. Government as part of their official duties and therefore is not subject to U.S. copyrights. Funding for work in the presentation by Scott C. Weaver on the use of VEEV cDNA clone methodology for propagation of viral stocks and challenge material in animal models was funded by NIH grant Al120942.
